ref: 6030 *tripanthaka ʻ three roads, third journey ʼ. [Cf. tri- patha -- n. ʻ place where three roads meet ʼ lex., Pk. tipaha -- n. and tivahaā -- f. ʻ name of Ganges ʼ. -- tri -- , pánthā -- ]
Or. temathā ʻ meeting place of roads ʼ (< *tevãthā); <->
L. tirvandhā, tar˚ m. ʻ third and final bringing home of bride to husband's house ʼ.
